Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution.rmi

Interface RmiHub

All Superinterfaces:
Remote, RmiProxy
public interface RmiHub
extends RmiProxy
The RmiHub interface defines the remote methods used by a RMI connector for creating and deleting the connections.
